examples.example: 以前的经历都是宝贵的财富，让我不断成长和进步。

translate.english: Previous experiences are all precious wealth, which enables me to keep growing and progressing.

examples.example: 以前我总是害怕挑战，但现在我充满勇气去面对一切。

translate.english: Before I always feared challenges, but now I am full of courage to face everything.

examples.example: 以前我遇到困难可能会退缩，但现在我会勇敢地去克服。

translate.english: In the past, I might shrink back when encountering difficulties, but now I will bravely overcome them.
